Package pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class that represents a physical piece
    Author:
    Umar Rabbani, Parth Shah

    • Constructor Detail

      • Piece

        public Piece​(int x,
             int y,
             java.lang.String color)
        constructor for piece
        Parameters:
        x - This is the x coordinate of the piece being initiated
        y - This is the y coordinate of the piece being initiated
        color - This is the color of the piece being initiated

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move​(int positionX,
                    int positionY)
        attempts to move a user specified piece to a user specified location
        Parameters:
        positionX - This is the x coordinate of the location that the user wants to move the piece to
        positionY - This is the y coordinate of the location that the user wants to move the piece to
        Returns:
        boolean This returns back to the caller letting it know if the piece was successfully moved to the desired location or not without putting the king in check

      • testMove

        public boolean testMove​(int positionX,
                        int positionY)
        does the same thing as move() but then undos the move right after a successful move used to test whether or not a certain move would place (or keep) its king in check
        Parameters:
        positionX - This is the x coordinate of the target location specified by the user
        positionY - This is the y coordinate of the target location specified by the user
        Returns:
        boolean This returns whether or not the move would be successful without keeping the king in check

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor()
        getter method to get the piece's color
        Returns:
        String This is the color of the requested piece

      • getY

        public int getY()
        getter method to get the piece's y coordinate
        Returns:
        int This is the y coordinate of the requested piece

      • getX

        public int getX()
        getter method to get the piece's x coordinate
        Returns:
        int This is the x coordinate of the requested piece

      • isValid

        public abstract boolean isValid​(int positionX,
                                int positionY)
        checks if move is valid
        Parameters:
        positionX - This is the x coordinate of the target position
        positionY - This is the y coordinate of the target position
        Returns:
        boolean Returns whether or not the requested move is permitted
